languages.text: Прославленная религиозная реликвия, переданная на хранение Вольному Торговцу, вставшему на сторону святых людей в споре с бездушными Адептус Механикус.
A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: Прославленная религиозная реликвия, переданная на хранение Вольному Торговцу, вставшему на сторону святых людей в споре с бездушными Адептус Механикус.

languages.text: Une relique sacrée fabuleuse, offerte {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} pour qu'{mf|il|elle} la protège, après qu'{mf|il|elle} s'est {mf|rallié|ralliée} aux pieux dans leur conflit contre les serviteurs sans cœur de l'Omnimessie.
languages.original_text: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Une relique sacrée fabuleuse, offerte {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} pour qu'{mf|il|elle} la protège, après qu'{mf|il|elle} s’est {mf|rallié|ralliée} aux pieux dans leur conflit contre les serviteurs sans cœur de l'Omnimessie.

languages.text: {mf|彼|彼女}が万機神に仕える薄情な者たちとの争いで敬虔な者たちと共に戦った後、自由開拓者に預けられたという伝説の聖遺物。
languages.original_text: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: {mf|彼|彼女}が万機神に仕える薄情な者たちとの争いで敬虔な者たちと共に戦った後、自由開拓者に預けられたという伝説の聖遺物。

languages.text: 在与欧姆尼塞亚的虚伪仆人的论战之中，行商浪人加入了信仰的阵营。这件传说中的圣物被虔诚的信徒交由行商浪人保管。
languages.original_text: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: 在与欧姆尼塞亚的虚伪仆人的论战之中，行商浪人加入了信仰的阵营。这件传说中的圣物被虔诚的信徒交由行商浪人保管。

languages.text: Una reliquia sagrada de fábula que fue entregada {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente para su custodia después de que se uniera al bando de los piadosos en su disputa contra los sirvientes de corazón hueco del Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Una reliquia sagrada de fábula que fue entregada {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente para su custodia después de que se uniera al bando de los piadosos en su disputa contra los sirvientes de corazón hueco del Omnissiah.

languages.text: Ein sagenumwobenes heiliges Relikt. Es wurde {mf|dem Freihändler zur Aufbewahrung anvertraut, nachdem er|der Freihändlerin zur Aufbewahrung anvertraut, nachdem sie} sich im Disput gegen die herzlosen Diener des Omnissiah auf die Seite der Frommen geschlagen hatte.
languages.original_text: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.

languages.text: Hermesih'in riyakâr hizmetkârlarına karşı mücadelelerinde dindarların safını seçtikten sonra muhafaza etmesi için Hür Tacir'e emanet edilmiş efsanevi bir kutsal yadigâr.
languages.original_text: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.
